mapper.select:
select
,
from site_info where site_id in
#{item}

insert into site_info (name, type, display, extra, create_time, modify_time, modify_user_id, value) values
(#{item.name}, #{item.type}, #{item.display}, #{item.extra}, #{item.createTime}, #{item.modifyTime}, #{item.modifyUserId}, #{item.value})
